title: NYDIG Calls for Bitcoin Treasury Companies to Drop 'Misleading' mNAV Metric
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: NYDIG argued that mNAV fails to account for operating businesses and uses assumed shares outstanding, which can be inaccurate.
